Text: This is the textbook definiton of a snowflake. I could give a flying fuck if a restaurant I liked donated to Biden or anyone I disagree with politically. If their food is good I'm fucking eating there.

two girls (trump supporters) pretended to be part of the protest in Madison, WI and destroyed property. The first picture was taken when a black man took them aside to explain how they were hurting the movement. Now we know their actions were intentional.

I fixed the White House propaganda video of Trump going to church. Here, feel free to use and share. Credits to all within the video.#BlackLivesMatter #JusticeForFloyd #DictatorTrump https://t.co/keOvx4j8R8
Pretty clear cut line of reasoning here from Biden on Trump not being an aberration, which was one of the most consistent criticisms he faced from the left during the primary
Biden on Trump's "when the looting starts, the shooting starts" tweet: "They weren't the words of a president. They were the words of a racist Miami police chief in the 60s."
Biden: "I want to ask every American...is this who we are? is this who we want to be? is this what we want to pass on to our children and grandchildren?"

He's using the American military against the American people.He tear-gassed peaceful protesters and fired rubber bullets.For a photo.For our children, for the very soul of our country, we must defeat him. But I mean it when I say this: we can only do it together.

Trump can't cope with the pandemic, can't avoid mass unemployment, and can't stem chaos in the streets but at least he can walk across the street (after clearing the block of nonviolent protestors with tear gas and flash bangs).Inspiring stuff.

#BunkerBoy Trump had to prove he could walk in broad daylight today so he sicced the police on peaceful protesters so he could stand there and awkwardly hold the Bible.  Dear God.  We need to end this nightmare of a presidency.
It is shameful the UK Government won't condemn Trump.Now is the time to speak up for justice and equality.#BlackLivesMatter #JusticeForGeorgeFloyd
